p: The LMT was also used to evaluate the efficacy of the extract in combination with IVM. For both, the inhibitory concentration of 50% (IC 50) was used. Initially, concentrations from 12.5 to 200 mg/mL of OFIEOH were tested with the addition of 25.7 µM of IVM. In a parallel test, concentrations from 11.4 to 57.1 µM of IVM were added to 82.80 mg/mL of OFIEOH.
